solution.title: Entry-Level Software Engineer - Remote
solution.description: Since you're looking for a full-time technology job as a beginner, consider applying for remote junior software engineering roles. Companies like Google, Microsoft, and startups offer remote entry-level positions.
actions: Build a strong portfolio with GitHub projects
Improve your coding skills via LeetCode or CodeSignal
Check out job boards like LinkedIn, Glassdoor, and Wellfound (formerly AngelList)

solution.title: Freelance Financial Consultant
solution.description: As an experienced finance professional, freelancing can be a great option. You can provide financial planning, tax consulting, or investment advisory services remotely.
actions: Join platforms like Upwork, Toptal, or Fiverr
Network on LinkedIn to find high-paying freelance clients
Build an online presence with a personal website and case studies

solution.title: Healthcare Internship - Clinical or Research
solution.description: Healthcare internships provide hands-on experience for students. You can work in hospitals, research institutions, or biotech companies.
actions: Network with professionals through industry events

solution.title: Retail Sales Associate - Part-Time
solution.description: If you're looking for a hybrid part-time role in retail, you can consider positions in e-commerce customer service or in-store sales.
actions: Apply to companies like Amazon, Walmart, or Target
Consider hybrid roles like online customer service
Work on communication and sales skills

solution.title: Senior Education Consultant / University Lecturer
solution.description: With experience in education, you can pursue a role as a senior consultant or professor. Many universities and EdTech companies hire experienced educators.
actions: Apply for lecturer positions at universities
Explore consulting roles in EdTech companies
Publish research papers to build authority
